availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel R. Epeling (Webster co., KY, farmer )

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Elizabeth Cole Epeling in Allen County, Kentucky, on May 2, 1836. Father of Preston W. Epeling, Sarah J. Epeling, Minerva J. Epeling, John W. Epeling, Caleb R. Epeling, William P. Epeling, and Mary E. Epeling. Farmer in Allen County in 1850. Farmer in Webster County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, p. 173A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 599.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Allen County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 23.
